query: Can the Commission provide a summary for the 15 Member State EU and for Austria of what measures were taken in 2003 and what the volume of funding was? How much money was used for extensification measures (broken down by type of extensification)? What percentage of the total payments for agri-environmental measures was received by the 10 % (or 25 % or 50 %) of the recipients who, in terms of volume of funding, received the most support (separate lists for the 15 Member State EU and for Austria)?
